subject: Rugby (Game)
lead_paragraph: After 74 years and 11 finals, Clermont Auvergne at last won the French national rugby union championship, beating the reigning champion, Perpignan, by a score of 19-6.
snippet: After 74 years and 11 finals, Clermont Auvergne at last won the French national rugby union championship, beating the reigning champion, Perpignan, by a score of 19-6.
